argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | evls1varpw.q | |- Q = ( S evalSub1 R ) |
| 2 |  | evls1varpw.u | |- U = ( S |`s R ) |
| 3 |  | evls1varpw.w | |- W = ( Poly1 ` U ) |
| 4 |  | evls1varpw.g | |- G = ( mulGrp ` W ) |
| 5 |  | evls1varpw.x | |- X = ( var1 ` U ) |
| 6 |  | evls1varpw.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 7 |  | evls1varpw.e | |- .^ = ( .g ` G ) |
| 8 |  | evls1varpw.s | |- ( ph -> S e. CRing ) |
| 9 |  | evls1varpw.r | |- ( ph -> R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) |
| 10 |  | evls1varpw.n | |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) |
| 11 | 8, 9 | #P_jca | |- ( ph -> ( S e. CRing /\ R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( S ^s B ) = ( S ^s B ) |
| 13 | 1, 6, 12, 2, 3 | #P_evls1rhm | |- ( ( S e. CRing /\ R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) -> Q e. ( W RingHom ( S ^s B ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` ( S ^s B ) ) = ( mulGrp ` ( S ^s B ) ) |
| 15 | 4, 14 | #P_rhmmhm | |- ( Q e. ( W RingHom ( S ^s B ) ) -> Q e. ( G MndHom ( mulGrp ` ( S ^s B ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 11, 13, 15 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> Q e. ( G MndHom ( mulGrp ` ( S ^s B ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 2 | #P_subrgring | |- ( R e. ( SubRing ` S ) -> U e. Ring ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 19 | 5, 3, 18 | #P_vr1cl | |- ( U e. Ring -> X e. ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 20 | 9, 17, 19 | #P_3syl | |- ( ph -> X e. ( Base ` W ) ) |
| 21 | 4, 18 | #P_mgpbas | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 22 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` ( S ^s B ) ) ) = ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` ( S ^s B ) ) ) |
| 23 | 21, 7, 22 | #P_mhmmulg | |- ( ( Q e. ( G MndHom ( mulGrp ` ( S ^s B ) ) ) /\ N e. NN0 /\ X e. ( Base ` W ) ) -> ( Q ` ( N .^ X ) ) = ( N ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` ( S ^s B ) ) ) ( Q ` X ) ) ) |
| 24 | 16, 10, 20, 23 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ph -> ( Q ` ( N .^ X ) ) = ( N ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` ( S ^s B ) ) ) ( Q ` X ) ) ) |
